title: IMassProperty2.CenterOfMass
description: Gets the center of mass of selected components/bodies.
returns: Array of three doubles of the x, y, and z coordinates of the center of mass
remarks:
If
IMassPropertyOverrideOptions::OverrideCenterOfMass
is true or
IMassProperty2::IncludeHiddenBodiesOrComponents
is reset, then call
IMassProperty2::Recalculate
before using this property.
